text: Emilio Lledó Íñigo (born 5 November 1927) is a Spanish philosopher. He has been a professor at several universities. He is a member of the Royal Spanish Academy.Royal Spanish Academy: Emilio Lledó He was born in Seville, Spain. He worked at the University of La Laguna for two years. Later, in 1967, he moved to the University of Barcelona, where he had been given the chair in Philosophy. In 1978, he moved again, to the National University of Distance Education (UNED), where he remained until his retirement.Proyecto Filosofía: Biography Lledó was elected to Seat l of the Real Academia Española on 11 November 1993. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish philosophers Category:Spanish academics Category:Spanish historians Category:Spanish writers
title: Emilio Lledó
